Articles.Content:
Ccurrently, you can't see what roll a kerbal is (sci eng pilot) apart from the lower right screen. The lower right screen doesn't let you transfer, just EVA,  which isn't helpful for tourists.

It's as simple as putting a "Manifest" button to provide a list of kerbals, their roll, and buttons for eva transfer and internal camera view. Perhaps check boxes so you can move kerbals like emails
